show_image.sourceCode:
{{indent}}def show_image(img, title=None, cmap=None, figSize=(9, 5)):
    plt.figure(figsize=figSize)
    plt.imshow(img, cmap=cmap)
    plt.title(title)
    plt.axis('off')
    plt.show()
